krushikarma katayuthu pulul kirima sandaha brithanya rajaya gannoruwa waththa yoda gath athara, 1912di krushikarma departhamenthuwada aarambha kaleya. 1916di krushikarma puhunu ha wyaptha katayuthu sandaha peradeniya krushikarma abhyasa widyalaya pihituwiya. 1927 idam komisama, idam nomathi gowinta, idam labadima sandaha nirdeshayak labadimata hethu wuye wadiwana gramiya dilindubhawayata piliyamak lesataya.

udeta udeta pol gediyak bindala gala dunnata, idala hitala rakata rotiyak pichchuwata ,mage pol samboleta wadiya oyage pol sambole rasayi ane kiwwama poddak ganan ussala pol sambolayak haduwata eeta eha deyaknam oya uyana pihana ansen mage saththalan podda danagena unne na.eekata dan udeta theka hadana eke idan rajakari eya pita pawarila.nahaya udata ada ada kandulu pera pera hotu hura hura lunu kapaddi, miris badiddi ane matanam dukath hithenawa.eeth ithin eya eewa karanne harima aasawen.tika dawasaka idan uyana nisa me wenakota hoda pragathiyakuth thiyenawa habayi ithin chandiya wage uyanna gaththata mundage kama galapima anthimayi.mul dawaswala eewata magen sahayogaya gaththata dan onna eekatath kamathi na.dan minihata oone wiraya wage hama dema thaniyama karagena kattiyage kredit eka thaniyama ara ganna.ane ithin podi ekage aasawane kiyala mamath innawa sadda nokara.menna samahara dawasata meka karatuth uyala alath uyala maluth kirata hadanawa.
